data.value: Client Obsession
Slide to the left or right to select a sentence describing your most likely behaviour.
Develop a client-centric organisational focus
I miss the opportunity to focus the team on exploring the client's needs (example: do not follow up or push a creation over client culture, ...).
I anticipate clients’ tendencies, trends and patterns and invite the team to integrate them into any decision.
I develop an organisation that places client needs and interest at the heart of any strategy.
I do not know.
Promote development of unique client experiences
I do not rethink or adapt the clients' experiences. I miss the opportunity to measure the Maison's reputation to shape new experiences.
I promote the development of unique experiences and gain clients’ trust.
I encourage the team to develop a strong client focus and credibility to tailor future solutions.
I do not know.
Foster a sense of pride for the maison's heritage and expertise in craftsmanship
I might be negative or critical, transmitting a poor sense of pride in the Maison's heritage and expertise in craftsmanship.
I breath the Maison and transmit a strong sense of belonging and pride. I tell the team about the foundational heritage stories and remind why we can be proud.
I promote the co-development, with clients, of the identity of the Maison.
I do not know
Keep focus and ensure client promises are delivered
I might not follow up and/or remind others what was promised to clients and must be delivered. I do not anticipate the reputational issues when client promises and engagement are not respected.
I ask the teams what barriers need to be removed to deliver what was promised to the client and/or promote a ‘walk the talk’ attitude.
I create conditions to enter into dialogue with the client, to jointly shape the expectations and raise their satisfaction.
I do not know.
Foster a data-driven culture to reinforce intuition
I do not pinpoint problems and opportunities from data, trends and patterns, missing the opportunity to redirect the team's activity.
I leverage quantitative and qualitative data to identify opportunities, redirect efforts and help the team to discern and make decisions.
I foster a culture where decision making leverages a combination of intuition, experience and solid data rationale.
I do not know.
